titleStmt.title: Castara the third edition. Corrected and augmented.
titleStmt.author: Habington, William, 1605-1654.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Cotes, for Will. Cooke: and are to be sold at his shop neere Fernivals-Inne Gate in Holburne,

notesStmt.note: The author, William Habington, is named on A9r.
With an additional engraved title page signed "W.M. sculpsit", i.e. William Marshall.
The second part has separate title page dated 1639; the third part has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere Fernivals-Inne Gate in Holburne
